MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH39 postcode area of North Berwick. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00am to repair faulty equipment on an overhead line pole near the Bridgend Aberlady substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.00am on Thursday 1st of April 2021.
